content.text: Leonero is a member of the Spade Pirates.
Leonero is a tall man with a large rounded jaw, pointy ears, and long legs. He wears a pinstripe jumpsuit, light-colored shoes, a top hat, and sunglasses.

Leonero cares greatly about his captain, Portgas D. Ace, since he was willing to defend him from Edward Newgate. Leonero can also be somewhat disrespectful, laughing at Deuce's adventure diary despite the fact that it is his main aspiration of their travels.
Like the rest of the Spade Pirates, Leonero cares greatly for his captain, defending him from a Yonko. However, he was not seen at the Battle of Marineford.

Most of the Spade Pirates' crew members (excluding Skull, Mihar, and Kotatsu) read and laughed at Deuce's poor writing in his adventure diary. Because of this, their names were excluded from the diary.
Leonero's abilities are unknown, but he and his crew were easily defeated by Newgate.
Leonero fights with a trident. It is unknown how proficient he is with using it.

Leonero joined the Spade Pirates and traveled with Ace as he made a name for himself. He helped fight off a group of bounty hunters, and, when Isuka infiltrated the crew's ship, he surrounded the Marine Ensign alongside his crewmates. However, she easily fended them off. After the confrontation, the crew reached Sabaody Archipelago. While they waited for their ship to be coated, Leonero and his crewmates explored the island and secretly read Deuce's adventure diary. They laughed at his poor writing skills, leading Deuce to exclude their names from the diary.
After the coating was completed, Leonero and his crew descended to Fish-Man Island to begin their journey in the New World.

At one point, the Spade Pirates were shipwrecked in Wano Country. The people from Amigasa Village were starving to death, so they tied the entire crew and stole all their food. The crew watched the villagers finish their meal and then broke out. Instead of attacking, Ace asked the villagers where he could get them dessert. They stayed in Amigasa Village for a few weeks and became good friends with Tama.​​

After Ace and Jinbe tied, Leonero and the other Spade Pirates defended their captain against Edward Newgate and were easily defeated. They were then taken into the Whitebeard Pirates like their captain. Leonero has not been seen since his joining.
